title: 3 Years After...
description: "3 Years After" is a story about a Special Forces team put together to help our nation in a most fragile time. The post 9/11 world has forced the United States government to develop new ways to fight and counter terrorism. During the initial testing of the latest technological breakthrough, Time Travel, a catastrophic failure occurs. This strands the test team three years into the future. They are greeted by a new world which has been decimated by war and infested by zombies. Will the team and humanity survive? Do they figure out what happened in time? This is the new version that has been edited.
author: G.R. Mountjoy
